doc.title: Finger Plays with Miss Lori
doc.plot: Miss Lori and her friends bring excitement to finger plays through live action. Children will feel like Miss Lori is talking and singing just to them. Don't be surprised if your child wants to watch it over and over again. Let's have fun with Finger Plays!! Finger Plays Include: Bunny Phoo Phoo, Baby Bumble Bee, 5 Little Monkeys, Wheels on the Bus, Itsy Bitsy Spider, and more!
